articles.description: Cristiano is made for the Champions League but Ralf tells us he can't do it all on his own.
articles.content: When asked if the environment will be one that our no.7 will thrive in, interim manager Ralf Rangnick told us:  “We will see. Again, he’s got enough experience. He’s used to this sort of hostile atmo… [+634 chars]

articles.title: What is Panchakarma? Aaron Rodgers says he did this 12-day cleanse - USA TODAY
articles.description: During Aaron Rodgers' conversation on the Pat McAfee Show, the Packers QB mentioned he had just finished a Panchakarma cleanse. What is that?
articles.content: As he’s done for the last few years, Aaron Rodgers spoke to "The Pat McAfee Show" as what could be a chaotic offseason for him and the Green Bay Packers continues, hours after he posted a lengthy Ins… [+2915 chars]
